Name: Chess Brain
About the game: Chess Brain is a chess puzzle game. The King must reach the destination. Draw the correct path and don't let it get killed by the opposite pieces! Every second all the pieces will move! Solve 30 puzzles! Some may be simple, but others will make you think about every second ahead! The correct path will take you to the destination point! Do you know the correct path?
